products.title: Filtra Black (Perforated)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure filtra black (perforated) perfect fit venetian blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality perfect fit venetian blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 180mm max width: 1300mm

 	slat widths available: 25mm
